sqlMap.select:
select id, admin_name, admin_password, allowed_api, allowed_cdr, allowed_guest, allow_ipc_inbound, allow_ipc_outbound, allowed_mobile, cdr_password, cdr_scheduler_time, cdr_synchro_time, description, dial_in, enabled, extension_prefix, name, number_executive, number_install, number_line, number_panorama, number_seat, payment_days, remotId, status, thirdId, url, version, vidyo_manager, vidyo_replay_url, portal_id from t_ext_vidyo_tenant where 1 = 1 and portal_id in ( select id from t_ext_vidyo_portal where 1 = 1
reference_id = #portalId#
)
(name like '%$keyword$%' or url like '%$keyword$%')
order by id desc limit #startIndex#, #pageSize#

select count(id) from t_ext_vidyo_tenant where 1 = 1 and portal_id in ( select id from t_ext_vidyo_portal where 1 = 1
reference_id = #portalId#
)
(name like '%$keyword$%' or url like '%$keyword$%')
